typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as short,
		KEYF0 as string,
		ERDAT as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		MATNR as string,
		VTWEG as string,
		BUKRS as string,
		FKIMG as string,
		VRKME as string,
		UMVKZ as string,
		MEINS as string,
		ARKTX as string,
		PRODH as string,
		MATKL as integer,
		SPART as string,
		WERKS as string,
		EAN11 as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['PO_2019_*.csv']) ~> srcSapPoData
srcSapPoData derive(FKIMG = replace(toString(byName('FKIMG')),',', '.')) ~> Mapping
Mapping sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		KEYF0,
		ERDAT,
		MATNR,
		VTWEG,
		BUKRS,
		FKIMG,
		VRKME,
		UMVKZ,
		MEINS,
		ARKTX,
		PRODH,
		MATKL,
		SPART,
		WERKS,
		EAN11
	)) ~> ToParquetFile
Mapping sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		MANDT as string,
		KEYF0 as string,
		ERDAT as date,
		MATNR as string,
		VTWEG as string,
		BUKRS as string,
		FKIMG as decimal(8,4),
		VRKME as string,
		UMVKZ as decimal(8,4),
		MEINS as string,
		ARKTX as string,
		PRODH as string,
		MATKL as string,
		SPART as string,
		WERKS as string,
		EAN11 as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		KEYF0,
		ERDAT,
		FKIMG,
		VTWEG,
		BUKRS,
		FKIMG,
		VRKME,
		UMVKZ,
		MEINS,
		ARKTX,
		PRODH,
		MATKL,
		SPART,
		WERKS,
		EAN11,
		MATNR
	)) ~> toSQLdb
